metadata.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique
metadata.help: accesskey attribute value should be unique

metadata.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
metadata.help: Active <area> elements must have alternate text

metadata.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
metadata.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

metadata.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
metadata.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.
metadata.help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body

metadata.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements do not contain focusable elements
metadata.help: ARIA hidden element must not contain focusable elements

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
metadata.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

metadata.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
metadata.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

metadata.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
metadata.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

metadata.description: Ensure aria-roledescription is only used on elements with an implicit or explicit role
metadata.help: Use aria-roledescription on elements with a semantic role

metadata.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
metadata.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

metadata.description: Ensures "role=text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants
metadata.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA toggle fields have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
metadata.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
metadata.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

metadata.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
metadata.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

metadata.description: Ensures <audio> elements have captions
metadata.help: <audio> elements must have a captions track

metadata.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
metadata.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

metadata.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
metadata.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

metadata.description: Ensures <blink> elements are not used
metadata.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

metadata.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
metadata.help: Buttons must have discernible text

metadata.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
metadata.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

metadata.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
metadata.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

metadata.description: Ensures content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations
metadata.help: CSS Media queries are not used to lock display orientation

metadata.description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly
metadata.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

metadata.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
metadata.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

metadata.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
metadata.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

metadata.description: Ensures every id attribute value of active elements is unique
metadata.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

metadata.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
metadata.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

metadata.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
metadata.help: id attribute value must be unique

selector: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, [role="heading"]

metadata.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
metadata.help: Headings should not be empty

metadata.description: Ensures table headers have discernible text
metadata.help: Table header text must not be empty

selector: div, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, [role=heading], p, span

metadata.description: Ensures elements in the focus order have an appropriate role
metadata.help: Elements in the focus order need a role appropriate for interactive content

metadata.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
metadata.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

metadata.description: Ensures <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
metadata.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

metadata.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
metadata.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

metadata.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
metadata.help: Frames must have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
metadata.help: Frames should have a unique title attribute

selector: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, [role=heading]

metadata.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
metadata.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

metadata.description: Informs users about hidden content.
metadata.help: Hidden content on the page cannot be analyzed

metadata.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
metadata.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

metadata.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
metadata.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

metadata.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
metadata.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

metadata.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
metadata.help: Links with the same name have a similar purpose

metadata.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
metadata.help: Images must have alternate text

metadata.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
metadata.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

metadata.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
metadata.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

metadata.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
metadata.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

metadata.description: Ensures that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
metadata.help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures every form element has a label
metadata.help: Form elements must have labels

metadata.description: Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes
metadata.help: Form elements should have a visible label

metadata.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
metadata.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

metadata.description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
metadata.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

metadata.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
metadata.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

metadata.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
metadata.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

metadata.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
metadata.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

metadata.description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
metadata.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

metadata.description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
metadata.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

metadata.description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
metadata.help: Document should have one main landmark

selector: [role=banner], [role=complementary], [role=contentinfo], [role=main], [role=navigation], [role=region], [role=search], [role=form], form, footer, header, aside, main, nav, section

metadata.help: Ensures landmarks are unique
metadata.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
Links can be distinguished without relying on color
metadata.help: Links must be distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

metadata.description: Ensures links have discernible text
metadata.help: Links must have discernible text

metadata.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
metadata.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

metadata.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
metadata.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

metadata.description: Ensures <marquee> elements are not used
metadata.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

metadata.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used
metadata.help: Timed refresh must not exist

metadata.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
metadata.help: Zooming and scaling should not be disabled

metadata.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
metadata.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

metadata.description: Nested interactive controls are not announced by screen readers
metadata.help: Ensure interactive controls are not nested

metadata.description: Ensures <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
metadata.help: <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio

metadata.description: Ensures <object> elements have alternate text
metadata.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

metadata.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
metadata.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

metadata.description: Ensure p elements are not used to style headings
metadata.help: Bold, italic text and font-size are not used to style p elements as a heading

metadata.description: Flags elements whose role is none or presentation and which cause the role conflict resolution to trigger.
metadata.help: Elements of role none or presentation should be flagged

metadata.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
metadata.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

metadata.description: Ensures [role='img'] elements have alternate text
metadata.help: [role='img'] elements have an alternative text

metadata.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
metadata.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

metadata.description: Elements that have scrollable content must be accessible by keyboard
metadata.help: Ensure that scrollable region has keyboard access

metadata.description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
metadata.help: Select element must have an accessible name

metadata.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
metadata.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

metadata.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
metadata.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

metadata.description: Ensures svg elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
metadata.help: svg elements with an img role have an alternative text

metadata.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
metadata.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

metadata.description: Ensure that tables do not have the same summary and caption
metadata.help: The <caption> element should not contain the same text as the summary attribute

metadata.description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.
metadata.help: Data or header cells must not be used to give caption to a data table.

metadata.description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a large table has one or more table headers
metadata.help: All non-empty td element in table larger than 3 by 3 must have an associated table header

metadata.description: Ensure that each cell in a table using the headers refers to another cell in that table
metadata.help: All cells in a table element that use the headers attribute must only refer to other cells of that same table

metadata.description: Ensure that each table header in a data table refers to data cells
metadata.help: All th elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader must have data cells they describe

metadata.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
metadata.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

metadata.description: Ensures <video> elements have captions
metadata.help: <video> elements must have captions
